page.title: 05THE VICAR,FENSTANTON
page.content: { } Mr{William Girard}is the Vicar of {Fenstanton and Hilton. He has been the Vicar since 1976. He lives in the new vicarage in Fenstanton opposite the church.It was built last year(1984).The Vicar's hobbies are{gardening,sailing,reading, {stamp collecting}and{learning wood {turning.} The Vicar has lived most of his life in{Fenstanton}and{Zimbabwe although he has visited many countries around the world. He became a Vicar because{GOD}told him to,so he answered his call.He wants to be remembered in the{DOMESDAY BOOK}as a{faithful priest The Vicar used to be a{LAWYER.}He gets as nervous before services as he would in court. He used to be sporty but now he is far too busy.He has lots of robes; the main one is called a cassock. The Vicar has been to many services in many {Churches.}
